title: PhishSentinel
description: An AI-powered phishing detection system that analyzes URLs and email content to detect malicious attempts.
extraDescription: ðŸš§ Coming Soon: This project is currently under active development. It will use Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning models to analyze suspicious links and emails in real time, providing early threat detection for users.

title: SkillForge
description: A collaborative learning and skill-exchange platform for developers and students.
extraDescription: ðŸš§ Coming Soon: SkillForge will allow users to learn new skills by collaborating with peers, exchanging projects, and engaging in interactive challenges. It aims to build a community-driven learning ecosystem.

title: AI Resume Screener
description: An AI-driven system that helps recruiters quickly screen resumes for key skills and experience.
extraDescription: The Resume Screener leverages NLP and ML to extract skills, experience, and achievements from resumes. It scores candidates against job requirements, reducing hiring bias and improving efficiency for recruiters.

title: Football Analytics
description: An AI-driven platform to analyze player performance and predict match outcomes.
extraDescription: Football Analytics integrates computer vision and machine learning to evaluate player movements, predict match statistics, and suggest strategies. It enables coaches, analysts, and fans to gain deeper insights into the game.

title: Healthcare Chatbot
description: An AI chatbot that assists patients with medical queries and appointment scheduling.
extraDescription: This chatbot leverages NLP to understand patient symptoms, provide reliable first-level advice, and guide users to book appointments with doctors. It enhances healthcare accessibility by offering 24/7 assistance and multilingual support.

title: EduVision Learning Platform
description: An adaptive e-learning platform that personalizes content based on learner progress.
extraDescription: EduVision combines AI-driven recommendations with interactive learning modules to deliver a tailored education experience. It supports real-time quizzes, progress tracking, and gamified challenges to keep learners motivated.
